title: Pixie & Fenway: Unlikely Friends at Two Mountain Farm
features: Can a chicken and a cat be friends? Illustrated by local children, Pixie and Fenway Unlikely Friends at Two Mountain Farm tells a true story of friendship between a chicken that was the victim of the pecking order and a house cat. With the underlying lesson of tolerance and accepting differences in others, this is a wonderful story for non-readers, young readers, and big kids alike. You never know where you may find a great friend.
description: Karen E. Rose grew up in western Massachusetts and is a graduate of Mount Holyoke College. After spending 20 years in Connecticut, she now lives on a small farm in southwestern Vermont. This is her first book.
